mean_en: to practise or make people practise a play, piece of music, etc. in preparation for a public; to prepare in your mind or practise privately what you are going to do or say to somebody; to repeat ideas or opinions that have often been expressed before
sentence: We are rehearsing the final scene of the drama show.
sentence_trans: 我们在排练这个话剧表演的最后一幕场景。
